main event: A military observation reported seeing one object at Ellington AFB, Texas, on 3/10/52.
interesting points: The observation lasted for only 3 seconds., The object was observed with a straight flight path., The observation was made from the ground and was visual only., No radar confirmation was obtained for the sighting., The report speculated that it was a probable meteor.
witness description: Captain Joseph H. Girard, an experienced military officer with 14 years of service.
